transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir. Srishti na baat kar rahi hu. Gadwal sarees collection, right?
Customer: Hmmm, boliye Srishti.
Executive: Sir, aapki request open ho gayi hai IndiaMART se. Matlab ki aap active nahi ho pa rahe hai, buyleads nahi consume kar rahe hai.
Customer: Kya issue aa raha hai?
Executive: Ha, mere ko, mere ko tum aa rahe ho, jaise kya fayda nahi aa raha.
Executive: Sir, but buyleads jab tak aap consume nahi karenge, unse baat nahi karenge, tab tak kaise business provide hoga? Tabhi to team check karti hai ki kitni aap buyleads consume kar rahe hai.
Customer: Aur isme jo jo aa rahe hai, ye pura fancy ke hai. Ye handloom ke nahi aa rahe.
Executive: Fancy ke aa rahi hai, handloom ki nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ha, handloom ki nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Abhi aapke paas dekhiye, ek buylead aayi hai Ganjam, Odisha se. 50 pieces ki requirement hai inko aur Gadwal saree wholesale aise karke aayi hai.
Customer: Kaunsa naam se?
Executive: Gadwal sarees wholesale.
Customer: Gadwal sarees wholesale?
Executive: Ha, Ganjam, Odisha se.
Customer: Check karna padega.
Executive: Ha, 50 pieces ki requirement hai aur inka jo aapko dekhna padega.
Executive: Kaha, buyleads se aaiye. Aap apna app open kariye.
Customer: Buyleads aa ke location pe jana?
Executive: Nahi, nahi. Recent pe jaaiye. Buyleads pe aane ke baad ek aa raha hoga relevant ka option aur ek recent ka. Ha, recent pe aaiye.
Customer: Ha, recent ka aa raha hu.
Executive: Scroll kariye. Gadwal saree wholesale karke aa raha hai option?
Customer: Gadwal sarees wholesale.
Customer: Aaa, to nahi nahi dikhta.
Executive: Aaji aayega. Ganjam, Odisha.
Customer: Haaji aayega wo aabhi aa jaake hai ya ghar mein to.
Executive: Aaji ka hai, 3 ghante pehle ka hai.
Customer: 3 ghante pehle ka hai to ye to mere ko four hours ago ka last bata raha.
Executive: Fancy sarees.
Customer: Banarasi semi, georgette sarees.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye. Gadwal saree wholesale, main aapka ye whatsapp number hai na? Main aapko ye buyleads bhej rahi hu. Ek minute rukiyega.
Executive: Ek minute. Ek baar aap whatsapp number apna boliye.
Customer: 855.
Executive: 855, ha aa gaya. Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Ab aap open kariye apna whatsapp check kariye, aaya?
Executive: Jaldi se check kariye, koi aur na consume kar le isko.
Executive: Whatsapp on kariye. Whatsapp mein abhi jo maine bheja hai.
Executive: Gadwal saree wholesale, Ganjam, Odisha. Jo thik hai?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Link pe click kariye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Pehle aapne number save kiya hai?
Executive: Link pe click kiya to kya aa raha hai?
Customer: Same Banarasi semi, georgette silk sarees bolke bata raha mere ko.
Executive: Nahi, ye nahi aa raha hai. Aap, aapne mera number nahi save kiya hai isliye link bhi nahi open ho raha hoga. Number save kiya hai aapne mera?
Customer: Are link, usko samajh mein kya hai wo link open kare to kya nahi kare to, main aapko save kare to kya nahi kare to, aapka link open kar raha hu na usme kya problem hai? Save kare to open hota wo? Number save kare to open nahi hota?
Executive: Agar aap save karenge to wo jo maine product aapko bheja hai na, jo buylead aapko bheji hai, sirf aapko wahi buylead show hogi aur koi nahi show hogi.
Customer: Aapka save kare to aata nahi to aapka number save kare to jayega wo nahi to nahi aata, open karne?
Executive: Aapko Gadwal saree wholesale karke nahi show ho raha hai, right? Aap ye bol rahe hai.
Customer: Wo screenshot bhejo nikal ke.
Executive: Thik hai, main screenshot bhej rahi hu. Ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Check kariye.
Customer: Ye mere ko nahi, ye mere ko nahi bata raha ye.
Executive: Mere ko, mere ko kaisa bata raha bolta hu, batata hu dekho aapko.
Executive: Dekho, ek to aapko show ho rahi hogi, Sikko Rich Pallu Gadwal saree silk, Pune Maharashtra ki.
Customer: Zara wait karo, main bole se zara suno. Jada jada nako baat karo.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Tumhe diye so link open kare to mere ko aisa dikha raha.
Executive: Kya show ho raha hai?
Customer: Dekho tumhe screenshot open kar raha hu, bheja hu aapko. Dekho.
Executive: Aise show kar raha hai? Ek minute.
Executive: Nahi, aise to nahi show karta hai. Aap ek baar buyleads pe aaiye apni, app par aaiye.
Customer: Jo main, jo main bheje so screenshot dekhe aap?
Executive: Ha, maine dekha. Isliye maine bola ki aap apni app par aaiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: App par aayenge to aapko buyleads pe click kiya aap, fir aapne recent pe click kiya.
Executive: Recent pe click karne ke baad India select kiya aapne.
Customer: Buyleads, buyleads click karke recent, ha, recent pe main.
Executive: Fir India select kiya.
Customer: India select, location pe jana?
Executive: Ha, location pe jaakar India.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Location pe jaake India waha se.
Customer: Ha, ab aapko Gadwal sarees wholesale bolke idhar dikha raha.
Executive: Dikha raha hai? Ha, wahi. Ganjam, Odisha bhi dikha raha hai?
Customer: Ha, Ganjam, Odisha.
Executive: Ha, ye buylead consume karke inse baat kariye. Abhi tak kisi ne bhi inse baat nahi ki hai. To aapka ye deal done ho sakta hai.
Customer: Contact buyer now pe click kariye pehle.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Consume kar lijiye pehle jisse ki koi aur na consume kare.
Executive: Contact buyer now pe ja kar ke send reply, nahi, send reply.
Customer: Send, send reply.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Send reply pe click karke continue chat.
Customer: Send reply kidhar rahega?
Executive: Kya, chat pe?
Customer: Idhar, idhar kya tha bhi enter karna?
Executive: Nahi, nahi. Sirf send reply kar denge wo, ha, text kar dijiye, chat kar dijiye, chat. C H A T, chat karke option hai.
Customer: Matlab kya?
Executive: Kuch bhi nahi. Automatically chala jayega. Ye automatically hota hai. Aapka jo product hai na wo automatically chala jayega agar aap chat pe continue karenge to.
Executive: Aapki ye buylead consume ho gayi hai waise. Aapke paas ja chuki hai kyuki mere paas nahi show ho rahi hai ab. Ab aap baat kar sakte hai inse call karke, thik hai?
Executive: Aur ek aur cheez.
Executive: Ye aapke paas Sikko Rich Pallu Gadwal saree silk, Pune Maharashtra, occasion hai wedding. Ye bhi buylead aayi hai to ye aapke related ki hai?
Customer: Ha, main call kar sakta hu.
Executive: Ha, bilkul kar sakte hai. Call kariye please. Call pe baat kariye.
Customer: Main karta hu.
Executive: Sabhi ko call karna hai, thik hai? Ha. Fir main aur bhi buylead aap dekhiyega aur bhi buylead aap consume karke baat kar lijiyega, thik hai?
Executive: Fir aap mujhe ek baar bataiyega ki kya baat hui hai.
Executive: [Foreign Language]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha, boliye.
Executive: Ha ji, baat hua?
Customer: Ha, baat kar raha hu abhi.
Executive: Thik hai, thik hai, baat kar lijiyega.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ha, thik hai. To aap location wagera saari cheeze baat kar lijiye. Aur bhi aapke paas buylead aayi hai, Sikko Rich Pallu Gadwal saree silk ki Pune Maharashtra se.
Executive: Inse baat kar lijiyega, thik hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To jo bhi hota hai fir mujhe bataiyega.
Executive: To main abhi aapki jo request hai wo close kar rahi hu mere hand se, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to consume buyleads.

- Receiving only fancy sarees buyleads, not handloom.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to consume buyleads.

- Executive sent the buylead on WhatsApp.

- Executive explained how to send reply.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call and talk to the buyer.

- Customer will inform the executive about the conversation.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, app, whatsapp
